General.Name: Penta Teknoloji Urunleri Dagitim Ticaret AS
General.Description: Penta Teknoloji Urunleri Dagitim Ticaret A.S. engages in the technology distribution business in Turkey. The company provides personal computers, computer components, peripherals and accessories, software, and server-storage and networking products, as well as documentation solutions. In addition, the company offers services, such as Bayinet V3, a B2B e-commerce platform; Bayinet mobil application for product review, warranty-failure tracking, etc.; Penta Technology Center, which provides demos, PoCs, hardware and software presentations, and end-to-end business solutions; Printing Technology Center for printing solutions; Printing Solutions Management, a printing management model that measures consumables and printer usage of the users; and Penta Subscription Management, a service, which enables the users to display and manage subscriptions. Further, it offers Penta OnAir, a communication platform to reach resellers and customers; Penta My Warehouse for physical storage and online management; and 10 to 10 delivery service. Penta Teknoloji Urunleri Dagitim Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Dudullu Organize Industrial Zone, 4, Istanbul, Turkey, 34775
